00036 class SearchService : public DnsSdService, public DnsSdProxyClient
00037 {
00038     friend class WaitForDnsSdServices;
00039     friend class Service;
00040     friend class DnsSdProxy;
00041

00044

00046     virtual ~SearchService();
00047
00048     bool StartSearch( const SimpleString eName, const SimpleString eRegType, WaitForDnsSdServices * eParent, IsServiceValidForMe eCallBack = NULL, void * eUserData = NULL );
00049
00050     bool IsAvailable();
00051
00052 private:
00053     SimpleString SearchName;
00054     int SearchNameLength;
00055     char Regtype[RegtypeLength];
00056     DNSServiceRef Ref;
00057     SOCKET DNSSocket;
00058     WaitForDnsSdServices * Parent;
00059     bool DNSSDConnection;
00060     bool IsResolved;
00061     IsServiceValidForMe CallBack;
00062     void * UserData;
00063
00064     // To memorise that a service is not suitable for us
00065     ServiceProperties ServicesNotSuitable;
00066
00067     // Search call back when using DnsSd directly
00068     static void FUNCTION_CALL_TYPE SearchCallBackDNSServiceBrowseReply( DNSServiceRef sdRef, DNSServiceFlags flags, uint32_t interfaceIndex, DNSServiceErrorType errorCode, const char *serviceName, const char *replyType, const char *replyDomain, void *context );
00069     static void FUNCTION_CALL_TYPE SearchCallBackDNSServiceResolveReply( DNSServiceRef sdRef, DNSServiceFlags flags, uint32_t interfaceIndex, DNSServiceErrorType errorCode, const char *fullname, const char *hosttarget, uint16_t port, uint16_t txtLen, const unsigned char *txtRecord, void *context );
00070
00071     // Search call back when using DnsSdProxy
00072     void DnsSdProxyServiceBrowseReply( DNSServiceFlags flags, const DnsSdService& CurrentService );
00073 };
